params.data: ABI encoded pick indices for all Draws. Expected to be winning picks. Pick indices must be less than the totalUserPicks.
params.drawIds: Array of DrawIds for which to calculate awardable prizes for
params.ticket: Address of the ticket to calculate awardable prizes for
params.user: Address of the user for which to calculate awardable prizes for

returns.prizeCounts: List of prize counts ordered by tiers.
returns.prizesAwardable: List of awardable prize amounts ordered by drawId.

params.drawIds: Array of DrawIds for which to calculate picks for
params.ticket: Address of the ticket to calculate picks for
params.user: Address of the user for which to calculate picks for

claimOwnership().details: This function is only callable by the `_pendingOwner`.

params._drawBuffer: Address of the DrawBuffer to push draws to

params.bitRange: Number of bits allocated to each division
params.cardinality: Number of sub-divisions of a random number
params.endTime: Timestamp at which the draw ends
params.startTime: Timestamp at which the draw starts
params.ticket: Address of the ticket to get total picks for

returns._0: Total number of picks for this prize pool / ticket

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setManager(address).details: Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

returns._0: Boolean to indicate if the operation was successful or not.

Deployed(address,address,address).notice: Emitted when the contract is initialized

calculate(address,address,uint32[],bytes.notice: Calculates the awardable prizes for a user for Multiple Draws. Typically called by a PrizeDistributor.

calculateUserPicks(address,address,uint3.notice: Calculates picks for a user for Multiple Draws.

claimOwnership().notice: Allows the `_pendingOwner` address to finalize the transfer.

getTotalPicks(address,uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Returns the total number of picks for a prize pool / ticket.

owner().notice: Returns the address of the current owner.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows current owner to set the `_pendingOwner` address.

userdoc.notice: The DrawCalculator calculates a user's prize by matching a winning random number against their picks. A users picks are generated deterministically based on their address and balance of tickets held. Prize payouts are divided into multiple tiers: grand prize, second place, etc... A user with a higher average weighted balance (during each draw period) will be given a large number of picks to choose from, and thus a higher chance to match the winning numbers.
